cv.abstract: I'm a leading mathematical software engineer and founder of Math.Software. I work with computational mathematical models and strong software engineering foundations optimizing for functional programming.

entries.title: Software Engineer
entries.description: I performed SWE and ML roles for combating digital fraud, adhering to the Y-Combinator Startup culture, where I:
items: Expanded document model support with **Golang**, and **Python**, experimented with potential techniques, analyzed metrics, and worked datasets out with **OpenCV**, **Tensorflow**, and **PyTorch**.
Applied and learned new ML/DL skills in short iterations for fraud and object detection on ID documents.
Developed in-house tools for my daily tasks and assisted colleagues with inquiries or blockers.

entries.title: Mathematics, Engineering Intern
entries.description: I contributed to developing ML and DS research while developing the company website and ERP web apps. I completed a Mexican scholarship for my activities with **Python**, **Deepnote**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vue.js**.

entries.title: Engineering Intern
entries.description: I worked in a team to develop a tourism application (Virtravl), building a full backend API in **Nest.js** with **AWS**, managed operations, helped with the **MySQL** database and the **Vue.js** frontend.

entries.title: MathSwe
entries.description: I continuously apply my mathematical and engineering background to modernize mathematics.

entries.title: Mathematics with Computer Science Orientation, Licentiate
